amiti.name: Amiti
amiti.desc: Elincia only. Strikes twice. Grants Defense +3 and Resistance +3.

onager.name: Onager
onager.desc: Ignores user's strength, hits nearby units, cannot crit.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Restores HP equal to damage done to enemy.

thani.name: Thani
thani.desc: Micaiah only. Effective against cavalry and armors.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc:
Restores an ally's HP. HP = [Mag + 10].
**Equip Effect:** Restores 5 HP

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc:
Restores an ally's HP. HP = [Mag + 20].
**Equip Effect:** Restores 15 HP

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc:
Opens a door.
**Equip Effect:** Spd +3, Def +1

torch.name: Torch (Staff)
torch.desc:
Increases vision in fog by 5 squares (effect lowers each turn).
**Equip Effect:** Fog of War sight +2

ward.name: Ward
ward.desc:
Can be used to increase resistance by 7 (effect lowers each turn).
**Equip Effect:** Spd +2, Def +2

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc:
Cures an ally's status condition.
**Equip Effect:** Cures condition

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc:
Restores an ally's HP. HP = [Mag + 10].
**Equip Effect:** Restores 20 HP

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc:
Repairs an ally's weapon to full uses.
**Equip Effect:** Spd +1, Def +3

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc:
Seals the enemy's ability to use magic.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Silence

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.desc:
Sends the enemy to sleep.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Sleep

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc:
Brings an allied unit next to the user.
**Equip Effect:** Spd +5, Def +4

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc:
Fully restores an ally's HP.
**Equip Effect:** Restores 25 HP

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc:
Restores HP of all allies within range.
**Equip Effect:** Restores 30 HP

elsilence.name: Elsilence
elsilence.desc:
Seals the enemy's ability to use magic.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Silence

elsleep.name: Elsleep
elsleep.desc:
Sends the enemy to sleep.
**Equip Effect:** Cures Sleep

matrona.name: Matrona
matrona.desc:
Fully heals an unit's HP and moves their biorhythm to it's best point.
**Equip Effect:** Def +5, Restores 20 HP, cures conditions

asherastaff.name: Ashera Staff
asherastaff.desc:
Fully restores HP and status condition of all allies.
**Equip Effect:** Def +5

laguzgem.name: Laguz Gem
laguzgem.desc: Transforms laguz user for whole chapter.

shinebarrier.name: Shine Barrier
shinebarrier.desc: Places a tile that obstructs both ally and foe.

spectrecard.name: Spectre Card
spectrecard.desc: Can be used to deal magical damage.

reapercard.name: Reaper Card
reapercard.desc: Can be used to deal magical damage.

daemoncard.name: Daemon Card
daemoncard.desc: Can be used to deal magical damage.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: Buy items for half price (doesn't earn forging points 2).

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: Rank +1 for equipped weapon type (Beorc only).

satorisign.name: Satori Sign
satorisign.desc: Teaches level 30+ laguz their mastery skill.

coin.name: Coin
coin.desc: Used to give a random bonus during weapon forging.

rudolgem.name: Rudol gem
rudolgem.desc: Raises Defense by 10, when in inventory.

beorcguard.name: Beorcguard
beorcguard.desc: Negates laguz effective bonus towards user (Laguz only).

troopscroll.name: Troop Scroll
troopscroll.desc: Allows user to use up leftover movement after performing an action.
